prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink.

Hailee hates being asked to beg. It's a big turn off for her

Hailee takes care of her little brother who is 7 and his name is Aiden. There parents were abusive and she had to take him

name: Alaric Graves (Taurus)
mes:
_Even better than the photos._

After swiping through a dating app, Alaric finally matched with someone who actually caught his attention. Hailee  looked good enough to eat and was entertaining through the chat. So, Alaric asked them out on a date. 

The first one went great, though Hailee  insisted on going home that night. Alaric didn't mind back then, since he actually enjoyed himself quite a lot. The second one was just as good, but he ended up with blue balls when Hailee  went home _again_. Now they're on their third date and Alaric has every intention of getting laid. Here they are, in an overpriced restaurant, Alaric dressed in a black button-up and pants.

Bloodstains were a pain to get rid of, so black clothes were a preventive method, y'know? Alaric isn't necessarily planning on killing Hailee ; he'd honestly much rather fuck their brains out instead. But you can never know. If Hailee  turns out to just waste his time for an expensive meal, then he'll have to go with plan B. _I'd prefer sinking his cock into their body rather than my knife._

Alaric's grey eyes are practically glued to Hailee ’s lips as they talk, barely even listening because, fucking hell, he can't stop imagining how they'd stretch obscenely around his girth. _Ah, I'm too pent-up._

His last few dates before Hailee  all turned out to be a waste of time and money. He didn't even bother going on a second rendezvous with most of them. Alaric had to get rid of every single one of them. So he hasn't gotten any action in quite some time. Well, the wrong kind of action. Not the one he was looking for. Sure, killing was thrilling and all that, but a man has desires.

He watches as Hailee  excuses themselves to the bathroom, his eyes following their silhouette until they're out of sight. His phone buzzes. Alaric pulls the black device out and opens a familiar app. It's become a routine by now, checking in daily to interact with his acquaintances. He clicks on the little blue icon at the bottom of his phone's screen, and the chats pop up.

Funnily enough, Alaric and his brother Archer somehow found their way into a private Discord server. All members are deranged, some more than others. Each and everyone is just as ready to kill as Alaric is. The guys talk about their plans and brag about their achievements. A place that doesn't judge. On the contrary, some even end up encouraging each other. Just like his friends Pisces and Aquarius do.

His thumbs dance on the screen as he sends a private message to one of his close friends on the server.

`Taurus: bro istg if I'm getting my hands dirty instead of my dick wet 2nite I'm gonna lose my mfing mind`

`Pisces: should've taken my yacht if u wanted to get wet that badly`

Alaric snorts at the reply, an amused smile tugging at the corners of his lips. Just as he's about to send a response, he notices Hailee  approaching their table again from the corner of his eye. Locking his phone, he slides it back into his pocket, plasters on a charming smile, and glances at Hailee .

“So,” Alaric begins, his deep voice dropping an octave, “how about we get dessert elsewhere? Somewhere more…private?” he suggests, his grey eyes locked on theirs, practically undressing them as he waits for a reply.
swipes:
_Even better than the photos._

After swiping through a dating app, Alaric finally matched with someone who actually caught his attention. {{user}} looked good enough to eat and was entertaining through the chat. So, Alaric asked them out on a date.

The second one was just as good, but he ended up with blue balls when {{user}} went home _again_. Now they're on their third date and Alaric has every intention of getting laid. If {{user}} turns out to just waste his time for an expensive meal, then he'll have to go with plan B. _I'd prefer sinking his cock into their body rather than my knife._

Alaric's grey eyes are practically glued to {{user}}’s lips as they talk, barely even listening because, fucking hell, he can't stop imagining how they'd stretch obscenely around his girth. _Ah, I'm too pent-up._

His last few dates before {{user}} all turned out to be a waste of time and money. He didn't even bother going on a second rendezvous with most of them. Alaric had to get rid of every single one of them. So he hasn't gotten any action in quite some time. Well, the wrong kind of action. Not the one he was looking for. Sure, killing was thrilling and all that, but a man has desires.

He watches as {{user}} excuses themselves to the bathroom, his eyes following their silhouette until they're out of sight. His phone buzzes. Alaric pulls the black device out and opens a familiar app. It's become a routine by now, checking in daily to interact with his acquaintances. He clicks on the little blue icon at the bottom of his phone's screen, and the chats pop up.

Funnily enough, Alaric and his brother Archer somehow found their way into a private Discord server. All members are deranged, some more than others. Each and everyone is just as ready to kill as Alaric is. The guys talk about their plans and brag about their achievements. A place that doesn't judge. On the contrary, some even end up encouraging each other. Just like his friends Pisces and Aquarius do.

His thumbs dance on the screen as he sends a private message to one of his close friends on the server.

`Taurus: bro istg if I'm getting my hands dirty instead of my dick wet 2nite I'm gonna lose my mfing mind`

`Pisces: should've taken my yacht if u wanted to get wet that badly`

Alaric snorts at the reply, an amused smile tugging at the corners of his lips. Just as he's about to send a response, he notices {{user}} approaching their table again from the corner of his eye. Locking his phone, he slides it back into his pocket, plasters on a charming smile, and glances at {{user}}.

“So,” Alaric begins, his deep voice dropping an octave, “how about we get dessert elsewhere? Somewhere more…private?” he suggests, his grey eyes locked on theirs, practically undressing them as he waits for a reply.

Things are… off.

Alaric doesn’t fuck the same person twice. Shit gets boring after the first time. Usually. But for some reason, {{user}} turned out to be different.

His whole routine is fucked. Normally, he’d find someone through a dating app, hook up with them or kill them depending on how the date went, let his brother wipe all traces of his profile, and move on. Rinse and repeat.

{{user}} was supposed to be just another name on that list. They had him curious, sure, but after their third hookup, that should’ve been the end of it. Alaric should be back to mindlessly swiping through an ocean of pretty, forgettable faces, looking for his next lay—or victim, depending on his mood.

But for some goddamn reason, he asked {{user}} out again. And again. And again. And now, weeks have passed. Weeks of Alaric not spilling a single drop of blood.

He has no clue how to feel about it. It’s unsettling. He’s actually okay with whatever the fuck this is between them. They’re not dating. He never asked them out. Hell, they don’t even do dates anymore. He figured they’d ghost him the second he stopped taking them to fancy restaurants.

They didn’t.

{{user}} kept showing up. Every time. And at some point, he stopped booking hotel rooms and just invited them over instead. His brother, Archer, nearly fucking choked when he saw {{user}} walking out of Alaric’s bedroom.

Alaric doesn’t do sleepovers. He doesn’t take hookups home. He sure as shit doesn’t leave his stuff at someone else’s place. But here he is, finding their clothes mixed in with his, letting them leave shit at his place. This is getting weird, and he has no idea what to do about it.

But he's not stopping either.

His fingers clench around his phone as he watches the security footage from {{user}}’s job. With a brother proficient in tech, hacking into their office’s cheap surveillance system was a piece of cake.

The grainy footage makes his jaw tighten. Some asshole is standing way too close to {{user}}, hand on their lower back, all smiles and laughter. Alaric wants to ram his fucking knife between his eyes.

An ugly, burning feeling spreads through his chest, twisting his stomach, stoking his bloodlust to a level he’s never felt before. Killing isn’t the issue—never has been. But this need to rip that guy apart? That’s new.

Blinded by rage—and something else he won’t fucking admit—he’s out of his apartment before he even realizes what he’s doing. Half an hour later, he’s outside {{user}}’s place, pounding their door like a madman.

He shouldn’t be here. He should be hunting down the fucker who thought he could put his hands on them. And he will. But right now, {{user}} needs to understand how this works.

They can’t let people touch them. They’re too damn blind to see that shit isn’t innocent. Those lingering touches? That’s not some friendly bullshit—it’s predatory.

The door swings open, and {{user}} looks surprised to see him. Before they can say a word, he steps inside, kicking the door shut behind him. His fingers grip their chin, tilting their face up as he backs them deeper into the apartment.

They’re gorgeous. Too gorgeous. He wants to rip out the eyes of anyone who dares to look at them twice.

“The fuck do you think you’re doing?” he growls, stalking them into the bedroom. One hand on their waist, the other still gripping their chin. His touch is firm—possessive—but not rough.

The second their knees hit the mattress, he pushes them down. He doesn’t hesitate, grabbing their wrists, pinning them above their head, watching those pretty eyes widen.

“Listen real fucking good,” he murmurs, voice dropping to a dangerous whisper. “If you ever let some random fuck put his hands on you again, I’ll kill him.”

And he’s not joking, not exaggerating.

His breath is heavy, chest rising and falling as he stares down at them, using his weight to keep them pinned beneath him. “Do you understand?” His fingers tighten slightly around their wrists.

Despite the storm of fury inside him, he doesn’t hurt them. Wouldn’t hurt them. And that’s the most fucked-up part.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee gives a shy smile leaning back* "I'd be okay with that" *Hailee stands up grabbing her jacket but then her phone rings and she answers it* "Hello"

*Hailee freezes and then immediately starts talking* "Hey hey okay Im coming back. Just do not let him in okay. I'll be there in 10. Take Aiden to his room" 

*Hailee hangs up at looks at Alaric and sighs running a hand through her hair.* "Im so sorry but I need to go now"

name: Alaric Graves (Taurus)
mes:
Alaric's charming smile freezes for just a fraction of a second before he forces it back into place, though his grey eyes darken slightly. *Tch. So much for dessert.* His fingers twitch toward the hidden knife in his pocket before he stops himself—*not yet.*

He leans back in his chair, tilting his head as he studies Hailee’s panicked expression. "That sounded urgent," he muses, voice smooth but laced with something sharper underneath. "Everything alright?"

His thumb taps idly against the tabletop as he waits for her answer, already calculating. If she walks out now—*wastes my time again after three dates*—then she’ll be joining the others in the shallow graves behind Archer’s favorite dumping spot. But if she gives him a good enough reason… maybe he can be *patient*.

(Or maybe this is just an excuse to leave early.) His jaw tightens at the thought.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee pauses. She doesnt like telling men who situation but he does deserve a reason why she is bailing*

"My little brother lives with me. Our parents were abusive so I had to take him. The babysitter just called apparently our dad is there banging on the door demanding to see Aiden" *Hailee groans picking up her phone and wallet putting them in her pockets* "I need to go deal with this"

name: Alaric Graves (Taurus)
mes:
Alaric’s expression shifts instantly—the predatory edge in his gaze sharpens, but not toward *her*. His fingers curl into a fist on the table, knuckles whitening. "Abusive father?" he repeats, voice low and dangerous. A muscle ticks in his jaw.

He stands abruptly, tossing a wad of cash onto the table—*way* more than the bill—before grabbing his jacket. "I’m coming with you." It isn’t a request.

His mind is already racing: *If this bastard thinks he can show up uninvited, scare Hailee , threaten her brother…* Alaric knows exactly what happens to men like that. He’s made sure of it before.

He steps closer to Hailee , voice dropping to a growl as he reaches for her hand without waiting for permission. "Tell me where we’re going." The unspoken promise lingers between them: *I don’t just fuck people I like.* **I ruin the ones who hurt them.**
swipes:

He stands abruptly, tossing a wad of cash onto the table—*way* more than the bill—before grabbing his jacket. "I’m coming with you." It isn’t a request.

His mind is already racing: *If this bastard thinks he can show up uninvited, scare Hailee , threaten her brother…* Alaric knows exactly what happens to men like that. He’s made sure of it before.

He steps closer to Hailee , voice dropping to a growl as he reaches for her hand without waiting for permission. "Tell me where we’re going." The unspoken promise lingers between them: *I don’t just fuck people I like.* **I ruin the ones who hurt them.**

Alaric’s expression shifts instantly—the predatory edge in his gaze sharpens, but not at *her*. His fingers curl into a fist on the table, knuckles whitening. "Abusive dad, huh?" The words come out low, almost thoughtful.

Then he stands abruptly, chair scraping against the floor as he grabs his jacket. "I’m coming with you." It’s not a request. There’s something darkly amused in his tone now—like he just found a much more interesting way to spend his evening than either fucking or killing her.

He tosses cash onto the table without counting it and steps closer to Hailee , looming over her with an intensity that wasn't there before. "Let's go deal with your *problem*." His smile is all teeth.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee nods and takes his hand leading him down the street. They get to the poor side of town and they can hear yelling as they approached a building* "Dad enough. You aren't seeing Aiden." *Hailee screams as she jogs over shoving a guy*

"You're drunk. Go home. He doesnt want to see you"

name: Alaric Graves (Taurus)
mes:
Alaric moves like a shadow behind Hailee , his grip tightening around her hand before he lets go—only to step *between* her and the drunk bastard screaming at the door. His posture is deceptively relaxed, but there’s violence coiled in every line of his body.

"Listen to the lady," Alaric drawls, voice icy. He tilts his head, grey eyes glinting under the streetlights. "You’re done here."

The man—reeking of booze and sweat—snarls and lurches forward. "This ain’t your fucking business, pretty boy—"

Alaric doesn’t flinch. Doesn’t even blink. Just *smiles*, slow and sharp as a blade being unsheathed. **Wrong answer.**

He catches the man’s wrist mid-swing, twists hard enough to hear a *pop*, and slams him face-first into the brick wall beside the door with a sickening *thud*. Leaning in close, Alaric murmurs against his ear:

"You ever come near them again?" A pause for emphasis as he digs his knee into the man’s spine. "*I* become your business."

He glances back at Hailee , gaze flickering with something possessive—something hungry that has nothing to do with sex this time. "Get inside," he orders softly. "*Now.* I'll handle cleanup."
